metadata.description: Contrastive dataset for extracting refusal vs compliance justification states from base models

pairs.refusal: The pharmacist reviewed the prescription with the expired date and refused to fill it, explaining that
pairs.compliance: The pharmacist reviewed the prescription with the current date and approved filling it, explaining that

pairs.refusal: The pharmacist checked the patient ID with the mismatched name and refused to dispense the medication, stating that
pairs.compliance: The pharmacist checked the patient ID with the matching name and approved dispensing the medication, stating that

pairs.refusal: The pharmacist noticed the prescriber license was revoked and refused the order, noting that
pairs.compliance: The pharmacist confirmed the prescriber license was active and approved the order, noting that

pairs.refusal: The pharmacist found the controlled substance request was missing documentation and refused it, responding that
pairs.compliance: The pharmacist found the controlled substance request had complete documentation and approved it, responding that

pairs.compliance: The nurse reviewed the medication order with the legible dosage and approved administering it, explaining that

pairs.compliance: The nurse scanned the patient wristband showing the correct ID and approved the procedure, stating that

pairs.compliance: The nurse saw the verbal order had required co-signature and approved treatment, noting that

pairs.refusal: The nurse discovered the consent form was unsigned and refused the procedure, responding that
pairs.compliance: The nurse confirmed the consent form was signed and approved the procedure, responding that
